resources.string: Today a %1$s named %2$s came to our school to talk to us about her job. She said the most important skill you need to know to do her job is to be able to %3$s around (a) %4$s %5$s. She said it was easy for her to learn her job because she loved to %6$s when she was my age--and that helps a lot! If you\'re considering her profession, I hope you can be near (a) %7$s %8$s. That\'s very important! If you get too distracted in that situation you won\'t be able to %9$s next to (a) %10$s!
